MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the PA19 postcode area of Gourock affecting properties in Iona Crescent and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete repairs on our underground cable network at Drumshantie substation, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:03pm on 8th January 2021.
